title: Don’t become a victim of drugs (Soviet poster, 1985)
Text: Don’t become a victim of drugs … Sobriety is the norm of life.
Additional Information: Shows an opium-spider sat in its web. Published in the Ukrainian SSR in Dniprodzerzhynsk (modern day Kamianske). ‘Sobriety is the norm of life’ was a slogan associated with the Soviet Union’s anti-alcohol (and drug) campaign launched in 1985.
